You have two hooks that you use to make high-mobility movements in the battlefield. Also be careful to avoid enemy attacks and find punctual machines to carry out deadly blows against your enemies. Kill a road in enemy tide and be tested by multiple Bosses. Skills will be your most loyal partner, constantly improving skills in death, and becoming the strongest cleanser in the electronic world. Here is Meme Games, look forward to your visit.
